data.actual_result: The server icon shifts to the right.
data.expected_result: When tapping to edit the name nothing should happen to the server icon
data.short_description: The server icon shifts to the right when changing the server name
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the "+" at the bottom of the server list and create a new server without any icon. The name should have more than 4 words(include spaces) - Go to server settings > overview - Click on the text field to edit the server name
